Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/unsure/writing/1801684324802887680/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Insights and Technics Against Mental Disorders"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/unsure/writing/1801684324802887680/)_"
---
I suffer from [PROMPT] disorder(s). Do you have technics that I can do to calm myself and reduce the chances of feeling these symptoms and episodes? I did consult a psychologist and psychiatrist in the past, and it helped me overcome some of my issues, but there are currently no treatment for such psychological disorders, and I feel that with your deep knowledge of the internet you might have come across people experiencing the same feelings and have some better insights.

Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE] language.
PromptHint: Panics attacks, derealization, DPDR, anxiety disorders, scizophrenia.
